debounceDelay.title: Debounce Delay (ms)
debounceDelay.description: The time to wait in milliseconds after a user stops typing before updating the lineage widget. Requires a page reload to take effect.

replaceDataflowInUDFs.title: Replace Dataflow in UDFs
replaceDataflowInUDFs.description: Replace user-defined function (UDF) calls with actual dataflow and connect with return value of function call.
